title: is the mastery emote being able to spammed going to be fixed or is it permanent.
body: is it permanent or a bug? because its seriously getting annoying having to play someone who spams it constantly all throughout the laning phase....

replies.body: You can 'mute'/block emotes on a player by player basis, so there is no problem here.
Aswell as the mastery thing showing up on kills/deaths etc which isnt showing up atm
